General.Name: Capitol Nusantara Indonesia
General.Description: PT Capitol Nusantara Indonesia Tbk engages in the shipping business in Indonesia. It offers shipping agency and transportation services. In addition, it is involved in the rental of vessels; barges and tugboat business; anchor handling tugs; floating crane business; and provision of oil and gas shipping services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Samarinda, Indonesia.

2.Name: Mr. Riduwan  Kosasih
2.Title: Fin. & Accounting Mang. and Corp. Sec.
